o. henry.gloss: United States writer of short stories whose pen name was O. Henry (1862-1910)

oh.gloss: a midwestern state in north central United States in the Great Lakes region

ohio.gloss: a midwestern state in north central United States in the Great Lakes region
a river that is formed in western Pennsylvania and flows westward to become a tributary of the Mississippi River

ohio river.gloss: a river that is formed in western Pennsylvania and flows westward to become a tributary of the Mississippi River

ohioan.gloss: a native or resident of Ohio

ohm.gloss: German physicist who formulated Ohm's law (1787-1854)

ohmic resistance.gloss: a material's opposition to the flow of electric current
